title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Fast-track to insights: AWS-SAP data strategy (ANT333)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 快速洞察之路：AWS-SAP数据策略 (ANT333)
abstract: This lightning talk showcases AWS and SAP's innovative solution for enterprise data integration challenges. Learn how to access data between SAP and AWS environments, eliminating complex ETL pipelines while maintaining business context. In this talk, we will demonstrate how to enable zero-ETL integration between SAP and Amazon SageMaker so that you can reduce time spent building data pipelines and focus on running unified analytics and AI/ML on all your data.
abstract_cn: 本次闪电演讲展示了AWS和SAP针对企业数据集成挑战的创新解决方案。了解如何在SAP和AWS环境之间访问数据,消除复杂的ETL管道,同时保持业务上下文。在本次演讲中,我们将演示如何在SAP和Amazon SageMaker之间实现零ETL集成,以便您可以减少构建数据管道的时间,专注于对所有数据运行统一的分析和AI/ML。
